title: Looking for Duo -bronze
body:
I'm looking for a duo partner sick of trying to solo my way out of bronze 
must know about
-warding (buying Visions)
-freezing Farm
-map awareness
-communication (letting jngler know if they have used flash)
- you must know that it is better to recall and lose cs then to die 
- just COMMON SENSE in general
- doesnt die before the timer hits 5minutes


if you understand the above send an add ingame
also i can play any lane but pref jungle and mid

replies.body: can play on my S IV Smurf? Gordons Here :3

> [{quoted}](name=spak,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=LrchjbEK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-02T23:36:49.125+0000)
>
> sure thing ill add you

sweet ill hop on at around 7 i usually fill roles
sweet as ill be at work at that time but when i see you online ill send an invite
never mind uninstalled lol, got to my bronze 1 promos and havnt won a single game im now bronze 3 ive had nothing but trolls and int feeders since then the community sucks balls

> [{quoted}](name=spak,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=LrchjbEK,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-03T01:50:42.361+0000)
>
> never mind uninstalled lol, got to my bronze 1 promos and havnt won a single game im now bronze 3 ive had nothing but trolls and int feeders since then the community sucks balls

lmao this guy

its understandable to die twice in the laning phase but when every game you have someone dying 3 times before you clear the first jungle wave that is ridiculous then they blame you for not helping how can a lv 2 jungler stop that from happening?
